comments.text:
We currently have redundant code to allocate CGColorSpace objects and we often use many needless copies of the same sRGB/Device color space.

As well we shouldn't use 'CGColorSpaceCreateDeviceRGB'. We either want the real device color space or GenericRGB so we should be explicit.

More information here:
http://developer.apple.com/library/mac/#documentation/graphicsimaging/reference/CGColorSpace/Reference/reference.html
